mapper.select: select a.no as id, a.project_no as projectNo, a.user_no as userNo, b.name as userName, b.no as userNo, a.task_name as title, a.start_date as start, a.end_date as end, a.status as status, a.crew_no as crewNo from task a, user b where a.user_no =b.no and a.project_no = 1;
mapper.update: update task set user_no=#{userNo}, task_name=#{title}, start_date=#{start}, end_date=#{end}, status="Todo" where no=#{id};
